channel.title: CVE Feed for wpclubmanager -- WP Club Manager – WordPress Sports Club Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpclubmanager -- WP Club Manager – WordPress Sports Club Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-1177|2024-02-05T21:21:46.213Z -- wpclubmanager -- wp%20club%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20sports%20club%20plugin
item.description: The WP Club Manager – WordPress Sports Club Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the settings_save() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.10. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the permalink structure for the clubs
